source.title: QAWM: QA World Model Learning
source.file: Formalizing tuple drift in quantum-native learning/PAPER2_COMPLETE_SUMMARY.md

claim: QAWM demonstrates that topological structure on QA manifolds can be learned from sparse oracle samples with strong generalization
invariants: All 21 QA invariants preserved in oracle computation
Feature extraction preserves exact arithmetic until f64 boundary
Learned predicates generalize across manifold sizes (Cross-Caps)
Learned predicates generalize across SCC structure (SCC-Holdout)

failure_modes.description: Model memorizes positions instead of learning topology

qa_theoretical_contribution: Demonstrates Unknownâ†’Known transformation: sparse samples reveal manifold topology
